name: Mystery Town
description:
Game for the UE4 Spring Jam 2020, theme: "What is hidden in the snow is revealed with the thaw".

A mystery adventure inspired by TV shows like Twin Peak and Netflix's Dark.

Gameplay Controls ActionKeyboard/MouseGamepad (Xbox Layout)WalkingWASD KeysLeft ThumbstickLooking AroundMouseRight ThumbstckInteractEY ButtonSprintLeft ShiftLeft Thumbstick [Pressed]Navigate Dialogue OptionsUp/Down Arrow KeysD-Pad Up/DownConfirmEnterA ButtonBackBackspaceB ButtonPauseEscapeStart Button Third Party Assets
